briefTitle: Effect of Early vs Late Drainage Removal in Women After Radical Mastectomy With Axillary Clearance
officialTitle: Prospective Randomised Clinical Trial Comparing the Effect of Early and Late Drainage Removal in Female Patients After Radical Mastectomy With Axillary Clearance
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Stage IIA and IIB breast cancer treated with radical mastectomy
* Obtaining informed consent
* Total amount of lymph in postoperative day 1 \<150ml

Exclusion Criteria:

* Stage I, III-IV breast cancer
* History of benign breast neoplasm or malignant disease of any origin
* Any breast surgery in the past
* Weight \<50kg
